tool_description: CraftMyPDF lets you design PDF templates in any browser with a drag-and-drop editor and generate pixel-perfect PDF documents from reusable templates and JSON data.
name: CraftMyPDF PDF Generation
title: CraftMyPDF PDF Generation

api_list.name: list-transactions
api_list.description: This endpoint lists all the transactions

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve only the number of records specified. Default to 300

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is used to skip the number of records from the results. Default to 0

api_list.name: get-account-info
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the account information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com/get-account-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com/get-account-info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "craftmypdf-pdf-generation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: delete-template
list-templates
api_list.description: This endpoint lists all your PDF templates

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset is used to skip the number of records from the results. Default to 0

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Retrieve only the number of records specified. Default to 300
